column5: Boston scored 3 goals in under 2 minutes...   Why is this Historic???   All the goals were scored during the same 2 minute power play!!!   How is this possible???   Carolina was on the power play, and gave up 3 short-handed goals.
lmao...sounds like carolina needs a bit of work with the special teams....or maybe they are just too "special" to realize it  i think there will be some new faces around their locker room come Monday
What a difference a couple of days make,the other nite Cam Ward looks like Jacques Plante in net and last nite he looked like George Plimpton.
Yeah , that is unreal at that level of play. Bet that one will stand for eternity or at least till I'm gone
Gee & I though you were going to mention something else as a first.  A loss to the lowly Leafs guaranty the Habs a post season spot.

No kidding, Rick! I've always hated the 3 point game. We knew teams were sneaking into the playoffs by losing in OT but the Leafs/Habs game... the perfect arguement against it.  Boston/Carolina.... yikes! I'd hate to be on the bad end of that statistic!
all 3 with less than 1:20 left in the penalty
